name: NSPersonNameComponents
desc: An object that manages the separate parts of a person's name, for use when you need reference semantics or other Foundation-specific behavior.

items.name: var namePrefix: String?
items.desc: The portion of a name’s full form of address that precedes the name itself (for example, “Dr.,” “Mr.,” “Ms.”).

items.name: var givenName: String?
items.desc: Name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from other members of a group that share a family name (for example, “Johnathan”).

items.name: var middleName: String?
items.desc: Secondary name bestowed upon an individual to differentiate them from others that have the same given name (for example, “Maple”).

items.name: var familyName: String?
items.desc: Name bestowed upon an individual to denote membership in a group or family. (for example, “Appleseed”).

items.name: var nameSuffix: String?
items.desc: The portion of a name’s full form of address that follows the name itself (for example, “Esq.,” “Jr.,” “Ph.D.”).

items.name: var nickname: String?
items.desc: Name substituted for the purposes of familiarity (for example, "Johnny").

items.name: var phoneticRepresentation: PersonNameComponents?
items.desc: The phonetic representation name components of the receiver.
